name: sera-ai-nova-hackathon
description: Sera AI - Amazon Nova AI Hackathon 2026 Submission (Agentic AI Category)

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.hackathon:setup: npm run setup:nova && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:nova: echo 'Setting up Amazon Nova AI configuration...' && npm run setup:backend:nova && npm run setup:frontend:nova
scripts.setup:backend:nova: cd backend && npm install @aws-sdk/client-bedrock-runtime amazon-bedrock-ai-sdk langchain
scripts.setup:frontend:nova: cd frontend && npm install @aws-sdk/client-bedrock-runtime amazon-bedrock-ai-sdk langchain
scripts.setup:env: npm run setup:env:root && npm run setup:env:backend && npm run setup:env:frontend
scripts.test:nova: npm run test:backend:nova && npm run test:frontend:nova
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.prepare:submission: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test:nova

author: Sera AI Team
